member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterCopyMode
member.summary: Specifies the copy mode used when calling .

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterCopyMode.SpatialAudioMetadataCopy_Overwrite
member.summary: Creates a direct copy of the number of metadata items specified with the copyFrameCount parameter into destination buffer, overwriting any previously existing data.

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterCopyMode.SpatialAudioMetadataCopy_Append
member.summary: Performs an append operation which will fail if the resulting has too many items.

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterCopyMode.SpatialAudioMetadataCopy_AppendMergeWithLast
member.summary: Performs an append operation, and if overflow occurs, extra items are merged into last item, adopting last merged item's offset value.

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataWriterCopyMode.SpatialAudioMetadataCopy_AppendMergeWithFirst
member.summary: Performs an append operation, and if overflow occurs, extra items are merged, assigning the offset to the offset of the first non-overflow item.
